experiences.description: Developed and maintained data pipelines for various internal projects. Implemented ETL processes using Python and SQL. Worked with large datasets and optimized data storage for improved performance. Contributed to the development of a new data warehouse.

Led a team of data engineers in building and maintaining a scalable data platform on AWS. Designed and implemented data ingestion pipelines using Kafka and Spark. Ensured data quality and availability for downstream applications. Mentored junior engineers and promoted best practices for data engineering.

Responsible for the architecture and implementation of a cloud-based data lake. Collaborated with product managers and data scientists to understand their data needs. Developed and implemented data governance policies. Led the migration of legacy data systems to the cloud. Researched and evaluated new data technologies.

education.description: Specialized in database systems and data mining. Completed a thesis on efficient indexing techniques for large-scale datasets.
Focused on distributed data processing and cloud computing. Developed a novel algorithm for data compression in cloud storage environments.
